Description: The entity hovers above the ground effortlessly. Its movement appears smooth and unaffected by gravity.
A deep, resonant growl emanates from the entity. The sound often signals agitation or a territorial display.
The entity alters its physical form rapidly. Each transformation maintains fluid continuity, as though its structure is malleable.
It disappears instantly and reappears moments later elsewhere. Observers report a faint distortion just before the shift.
The entity emits a soft radiance that pulses rhythmically. The light intensity varies based on its emotional state.
Soft, indecipherable whispers surround the entity. The voices seem to echo from multiple directions at once.
Its shadow moves independently from its body. At times the shadow stretches or shifts as though alive.
Objects nearby move without physical contact. Subtle vibrations often precede the entitiess telekinetic actions.
